CutSceneText.Text: The Asmodians are dangerous, but the biggest threat in the Abyss are the Balaur.
And the Balaur battleship called a Dredgion is the most fearsome of them all.
We don't know where Dredgions come from, where they go,
or even what path they follow through the Abyss.
When a Dredgion appears, it drops a horde of Drakans,
then bombards the ground with a barrage of devastation.
We have yet to discover a weakness in its potent defenses.
So for now, whenever a Dredgion appears, we take cover.
